mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.employee_serial, e.employee_name, e.employee_gender, e.employee_age, d.id d_id, d.department_name, d.department_serial, p.professional_name, p.id p_id FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.d_id = d.id left join professional p on p.id = e.p_id

SELECT e.id, e.employee_serial, e.employee_name, e.employee_gender, e.employee_age, d.id d_id, d.department_name, d.department_serial, p.professional_name, p.id p_id FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.d_id = d.id left join professional p on e.p_id = p.id where p.id = 5 and d.id = 5

SELECT e.id, e.employee_serial, e.employee_name, e.employee_gender, e.employee_age, d.id d_id, d.department_name, d.department_serial, p.professional_name, p.id p_id FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.d_id = d.id left join professional p on p.id = e.p_id WHERE e.employee_serial like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or e.employee_name like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or e.employee_gender like concat('%', #{info}, '%') or e.employee_age like concat('%', #{info}, '%')
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(e.id) as num FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.d_id = d.id GROUP BY e.d_id;
SELECT p.professional_name, COUNT(e.id) as num FROM employee e LEFT JOIN professional p ON e.p_id = p.id GROUP BY e.p_id;
